Name: The Mighty Quest
About the game: The Mighty Quest is combining elements of platformer and 2D RPG. Explore faraway lands and stop The Great Ring from waking up the ancient evil. On your way you will visit The Lava City, mountains, The Lost City, wasteland, The Blacksand land, dark woods, mines, swamps and many other places. This way is hard and there are a lot of checkpoints to try your best more and more. During your journey you can equip different weapons and shields but your main power is your fire attacks.
